title: Installation issue: mumps on NERSC Cori w/ Intel 19.1.1.217
body:
Using `spack@develop` (3-Aug, 4c97a0ea1cbcb42fff4cb2183552b6b6c441d791) on **NERSC Cori** (`cray-cnl7-haswell`) with `%intel@19.1.1.217`:

`mumps` concrete spec: [mumps.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5032052/mumps.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [mumps-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5032050/mumps-build-out.txt)

```
$> spack install mumps -f ./mumps.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing mumps
==> mumps: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' 'sexamples'

1 error found in build log:
     201    ** The compiler has encountered an unexpected problem.
     202    ** Segmentation violation signal raised. **
     203    Access violation or stack overflow. Please contact Intel Support for assistance.
     204
     205    fortcom: Severe: **Internal compiler error: internal abort** Please report this error along with the circumstances in which it occurred in a Software Problem R
            eport.  Note: File and line given may not be explicit cause of this error.
     206
  >> 207    ifort: error #10014: problem during multi-file optimization compilation (code 3)
     208    make[3]: *** [Makefile:192: ../lib/libmumps_common.so] Error 3
     209    make[3]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     210    make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-mumps-5.3.3-mbf54nu4rccgkddemunf7keislxccqnh/spack-src/src'
     211    make[2]: *** [Makefile:15: s] Error 2
     212    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-mumps-5.3.3-mbf54nu4rccgkddemunf7keislxccqnh/spack-src/src'
     213    make[1]: *** [Makefile:40: mumps_lib] Error 2
```

@shahzebsiddiqui
